meanings.definition: The complete set of genes or genetic material present in a cell or organism.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the genomes of different animals to understand their characteristics.
meanings.sent2: The genomes of humans contain information that determines eye color and height.
meanings.sent3: The genomes of the fruit flies decided to throw a party in the nucleus.
meanings.sent4: In the library of life, genomes are the intricate books that hold the secrets of existence.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the genomes of plants reveals the amazing diversity of life on Earth.

meanings.definition: The entire genetic material of an individual or species.
meanings.sent1: Genomes play a crucial role in passing traits from parents to offspring.
meanings.sent2: By analyzing genomes, scientists can trace the evolutionary history of different species.
meanings.sent3: The genomes of the penguins decided to have a genetic code fashion show.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean of genetics, genomes are the treasure chests of inheritance.
meanings.sent5: Unlocking the mysteries hidden within genomes leads to groundbreaking discoveries in biology.
